notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: C.C., design of the study and writing of the manuscript; M.T., E.C. and F.V., critical revision/discussion of the manuscript for important intellectual content; F.M., S.S. and P.P., elaboration of the statistical analysis and interpretation of data; L.R., M.M. and E.T., creation of tables and graphics. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
